scripts.dev: export NODE_ENV=development && sass stylesheet.scss stylesheet.css --sourcemap=none && npx tailwindcss-cli@latest build stylesheet.css -o stylesheet.css && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=development
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production && sass stylesheet.scss stylesheet.css --sourcemap=none && npx tailwindcss-cli@latest build stylesheet.css -o stylesheet.css && cleancss -o stylesheet.css stylesheet.css && npx webpack --config webpack.config.js --mode=production
